longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for the period of intended stay.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of Ukraine
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, exists from June through October in areas bordering
  Tajikistan and Uzbekistan (Batken, Jalal-Abad and Osh
  regions) and in the outskirts of Bishkek. Recommended
  prevention: A.
shortInfo: 90 дней, далее необходимо регистрироваться безвизово до 90 дней
